mapper.insert: insert into bus_task (bus_id, bus_name, create_user_id, create_user_name, customer_name, customer_mobile, create_date, flow_id, end_date, `status`) values (#{busId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{busName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bus_task set bus_name = #{busName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_mobile = #{customerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where bus_id = #{busId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select bus_id, bus_name, create_user_id, create_user_name, customer_name, customer_mobile, create_date, flow_id, end_date, `status` from bus_task where bus_id = #{busId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
